# Spellcrash, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[8th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 8]], [[8th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 8]], [[8th Level Witch Spells|Witch 8]], [[8th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 8]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 15th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 15]], [[BoXM 15th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 15]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Target:** One creature

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Will negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Advanced Class Guide, pg. 194

This spell functions as *[[Spellcrash, Lesser (Spell)|lesser spellcrash]]*, except that it affects a 7th-level or lower prepared spell or spell slot.
